author: stoddard
msg: Win32: A little tweak to make writing to the error logs a bit happier.
Ultimately, I think we need some form of cross process locking (LockFile
or LockFileEx) to make SetFilePointer and WriteFile atomic.

author: stoddard
msg: Reimplement ap_writev, et. al. using ap_write.

author: rbb
msg: Add another reason to justify the error scheme we are using.

author: bjh
msg: Turn os2errno into OS/2 version of ap_canonical_error().

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: First hack at non-blocking & time-outable pipes.
